name: Man Vs. Stairs
description:
In this QWOP- clone game, players must navigate through an infinite set of stairs in order to achieve the highest score possible. Use the left and right arrows or A and D to control the legs, which always move opposite of each other. Use the up and down arrows or W and S to control the calf movement for more precise control.  Still he's drunk though, so it wont be an easy task to accomplish.

With the Theme of "Game as Narrative", this game tells a harrowing story of and older gentleman after leaving a hooters completely drunk. Faced with stairs, the man will have troubles traversing to the bottom, if there even is one...
